topological_sort[source]

topological_sort(graph:Graph)

calc topological sort of a DAG

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
?topological_sort

Signature: topological_sort(graph: graph_utils.core.Graph) -> List
Docstring: calc topological sort of a DAG
File:      ~/proj/graph-algorithms-python-pluralsight/<ipython-input-5-c5c68c470b11>

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
g = gu.AdjacencyMatrixGraph(9, directed=True)
g.add_edge(0,1)
g.add_edge(1,2)
g.add_edge(2,7)
g.add_edge(2,4)
g.add_edge(2,3)
g.add_edge(1,5)
g.add_edge(5,6)
g.add_edge(3,6)
g.add_edge(3,4)
g.add_edge(6,8)
# g.display()
assert topological_sort(g) == [0, 1, 2, 5, 3, 7, 4, 6, 8]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
g.add_edge(2, 1)

try:
    topological_sort(g)
    raise Exception('A cyclic graph should have raised an error for top sort')
except ValueError:
    print('ok')
except Exception as e:
    raise(e)

ok
